channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ukrainian refugee leaves UK sixth-form college that urged her ‘to study Russian’
item.description: Kateryna Endeberia says teachers made the ‘hurtful’ request when she had difficulty with other subjects A Ukrainian refugee has been forced to drop ou...

item.title: Western Australia faces bushfire threat as cold, wet and bumpy Sydney to Hobart yacht race forecast
item.description: WA facing several fire warnings as Perth temperatures exceed 40C while Melbourne on track for coldest Christmas since 2006 Get our breaking news email...

item.title: UK electric car charger rollout slows amid worries over EV switch
item.description: Smallest number of new chargers since 2022 as carmakers persuade government to weaken EV sales targets The UK’s rollout of electric car chargers slack...

item.title: Hundreds of thousands newly displaced as Islamic State insurgency expands in Mozambique
item.description: Rising numbers of people flee jihadists, as violence against civilians increases and foreign aid dwindles More than 300,000 people have been displaced...

item.title: Redknapp runner among King George contenders
item.description: Fact To File, Gaelic Warrior and Harry Redknapp's The Jukebox Man head the confirmations for the King George VI Chase at Kempton on Boxing Day.

item.title: The 25 best sports photos of 2025 - and the stories behind them

item.title: 'England must stir themselves to find a Christmas miracle'

item.title: Turkey arrests 115 IS suspects 'planning New Year's attacks'
item.description: Turkish authorities say firearms were seized and efforts to trace further suspected members are continuing.

item.title: Cold health alert as parts of UK set to freeze on Christmas Day
item.description: Organisers of some Christmas Day and Boxing Day swims have cancelled events due to the weather.
